Sarah Bouyain (a mụrụ n'afọ 1968) bụ onye edemede na onye nduzi ihe nkiri French-Burkinabé
E wepụtara ihe nkiri mbụ ya, The Place in Between, n'afọ 2010.
A mụrụ Bouyain na Reims, Marne, France
Nne ya, onye bụ onye French, na nna ya, onye ọkara Burkinabé na ọkara French, zutere na France mgbe ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ n'ebe ahụ.

Ebe ọ gụrụ mgbakọ na mwepụ na mbụ, Bouyain mechara gbanwee uche ya na ihe nkiri, na-amụ na Louis Lumière School of Cinematography. Ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ dịka nwanyị na-ese foto maka ọtụtụ ihe nkiri, ma mesịa duzie ọtụtụ nke ya. N'afọ 2000, o mepụtara ihe nkiri Les enfants du Blanc
O dere akwụkwọ ya Metisse façon n'afọ 2003 mgbe ọ nyochachara ihe nketa Africa ya na Burkina Faso

Ọ mụtara banyere akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Upper Volta (dịka a maara Burkina Faso n'oge ọchịchị) na ụmụaka ndị ụmụ nwanyị Afrịka na ndị agha France mụrụ naanị ka a manyere ha ịhapụ nne ha ibi n'ụlọ ụmụ mgbei
Ihe odide Metisse façon dabeere na ụmụaka ndị a.
Bouyain edeela edemede, ọkachasị na isiokwu nke agbụrụ na ịgba ọsọ ndụ, maka Africultures, Presence Africaine na CODESRIA.
Ihe nkiri mbụ ya bụ Notre Étrangère ("The Place In Between";  afọ 2010), nke The Hollywood Reporter kpọrọ "A nicely observed docudrama banyere nwa agbọghọ French nke na-alaghachi na mgbọrọgwụ ya
" Akụkọ ihe nkiri ahụ dabeere na nwanyị agbụrụ dị iche iche aha ya bụ Amy nke laghachiri Burkina Faso
Gaelle Mace dere ihe nkiri ahụ ma gosipụta ya n'afọ 2010 Toronto International Film Festival Boyain kwuru na ihe nkiri ahụ were afọ asaa iji mee n'ozuzu ya
O kwuru na ya eleghị ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Afrịka tupu o mee ya.
Bouyain bụ otu n'ime ndị ọkà okwu na African Women in Film Forum nke emere na Accra, Ghana n'etiti 23 na 25 Septemba afọ 2013.
